For example, if you access third-party services, such as Microsoft, Apple, Google, Wonde or Clever to login to the Webite or to share information about your experience with others, we may collect information from these third-party services.
If You are located in Canada, this section applies to You; We may process your information if You gave given us specific permission to use your Personal Information for a specific purpose or in situations where You give implied consent.
In some exceptional circumstances, We may be legally permitted under applicable law to process your information without your consent.
Unless You opt out of certain communication features, We may use your information to communicate with You, such as through email, newsletters, and telephone.
We automatically collect certain information when You visit, use or navigate our Website.
When you use our Services, We automatically collect information on the type of device You use and the version of your operating system.

We only collect Personal Information that is reasonably necessary to provide our Services to You for the following purposes: To make you recommendations about our Services and to follow up your enquiries, We also use contact information from registered users to manage their accounts, to provide customer support, and notice them about their subscriptions.
We only collect Personal Information that is reasonably necessary to provide our Services to You for the following purposes: We use contact information to communicate and interact with You directly to send notifications regarding upcoming feature updates or promotions.
Google Analytics uses "cookies" to analyse the use You make of the Website.

In general; We use the information We collect to fulfill any orders placed through the Website, to communicate with You, to send you information about us, in the event you give explicit consent, to send you updates and announcements about our products and services, promotions, and programs, and to send you invitations to join our special programs; to customize our products and services' content based on your past events within our Website, in case you give explicit consent; to provide personalized location-based services and content using the physical location of your device.
We can also transfer your Personal Information to our data service provider.

From time to time, We may collect Personal Information about You from other sources, such as our partners or other third parties, for example where you have given permission to the third party to share your information with us.
If You are a visitor of our Website and/or if You would like to use certain features of our Website and/or play QuizFlight games we shall collect your Personal Information either directly or indirectly.

5. HOW LONG WE KEEP YOUR PERSONAL INFORMATION
We can also transfer your Personal Information to our data service provider.
We may also collect Personal Information from integrated third-party technologies.
We may process your Personal Information if You have given us consent to use your Personal Information for a specific purpose.
We only collect Personal Information that is reasonably necessary to provide our Services to You for the following purposes:
We only use your Personal Information when we have a legitimate reason for doing so.
We only use your personal data when the law allows us to do.
We shall collect, process and store your Personal Information outside of your residency.
We will keep your Personal Information for as long as it is necessary to fulfill the purpose for which We obtained your Personal Information and any other permitted purposes permitted by law, and in compliance with our data retention policies.
We will share transaction data with our payment service providers only to the extent necessary for the purposes of processing your payments.
